yarangi.graphics.quadraturin
Class QuadVoices

java.lang.Object
  yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.EventManager
      yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.QuadVoices
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, EventListener, StageListener, Loopy
public class QuadVoices
extends EventManager
implements Loopy

Used to aggregate the regular AWT keyboard and mouse events, transformed mouse events, cursor hover and picking events and whatever else that will become a requirement in the future. Runs as a separate thread. All accumulated event are dispatched at once. TODO: add "TransfomationEvent" to adjust mouse-world conversion? TODO: append CursorMotionEvent listener that fires GUIEvents?

Author:
Dve Yarangi
